title: Ruby and Sameh Abdel Aziz divorce just THREE WEEKS after the birth of their firstborn!
text:
Ruby and Sameh Abdel Aziz divorce just THREE WEEKS after the birth of their firstborn! Ruby and Sameh Abdel Aziz divorce just THREE WEEKS after the birth of their firstborn! 2.5 5 
Published October 14th, 2015 - 13:30 GMT via SyndiGate.info Rate Article: Ruby and Sameh Abdel Aziz have ended their marriage. (File photo) Follow > Click here to add Facebook as an alert Click here to remove the Facebook alert Disable alert for Facebook Click here to add Ruby as an alert Click here to remove the Ruby alert Disable alert for Ruby Click here to add Sameh Abdel as an alert Click here to remove the Sameh Abdel alert Disable alert for Sameh Abdel , Click here to add Sameh Abdel Aziz as an alert Click here to remove the Sameh Abdel Aziz alert Disable alert for Sameh Abdel Aziz 
This just in, Egyptian actress-singer Ruby and her husband director Sameh Abdel Aziz have divorced. 
As shocking as it may be, the new parents have divorced just three weeks after the birth of their firstborn child "Teebah," and after just two years of marriage. 
Photo: Sameh with his and Ruby's daughter "Teebah" in the US. (File photo) 
While the divorce was finalized upon Sameh's return to Egypt from the US three weeks ago, where Ruby is currently staying with their daughter , he revealed that they had already agreed on parting ways months ago. 
Despite calling it quits, Sameh said that him and Ruby are the best of friends for the sake of Teebah, reported Al Quds Al Arabi. 
Meanwhile, Ruby confirmed the news on her official Facebook page with a photo captioned, "Everything in life has to do with destiny." 
But the question remains, will he stay with his first wife and three children, or say bye-bye to them as well? Advertisement Â© 2000 - 2015 Al Bawaba (www.albawaba.com) Rate Article:
